I actually ordered this for my 11 yo daughter.  She's really into anime and goth, and this is sort of a cool hybrid between them.  She's 5'2" and the small fits her.  So guys?  Size way up.  This fits my kid!Anyway, it's a cool pullover.  The best part is the hood, which has the straps to bring the lower face shield up and over the mouth and nose.  She loves that bit.  There are pockets on the side that have a sort of drawstring closure.  However, the drawstring had pulled out  of the 2 pockets on one side.  They're sewn in, so I can't pull them all the way out, nor can I restring them.  I'll probably have to cut those strings off.Anyway, this is a cool pullover - just be mindful of sizing and check your pockets.

Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4/5 stars)  I recently purchased the XYXIONGMAO Streetwear/Techwear Hoodie, and I'm quite pleased with my overall experience. This hoodie strikes a balance between comfort and style, but there are a couple of points worth noting.  Sizing: ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4/5 stars) First and foremost, sizing is essential to mention. I typically wear a size medium, but following recommendations, I decided to order an XXL, and it turned out to be the perfect size. So, if you're considering this hoodie, make sure to order a size larger than you normally wear. This sizing quirk can be a bit confusing, but once you get it right, the fit is spot on.  Comfort: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5 stars) The hoodie's comfort is undeniable. It feels like a warm embrace with its soft and cozy interior. I've received numerous compliments on how comfortable it looks, and it's been my go-to choice for those chilly evenings or relaxed days. The level of comfort definitely makes it worth the purchase.  Style: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5 stars) This hoodie nails the streetwear/techwear style. It's sleek, modern, and definitely an eye-catcher. The design is versatile enough to pair with various outfits, making it a valuable addition to any wardrobe.  Pockets: ⭐⭐⭐☆☆ (3/5 stars) The only aspect that didn't quite meet my expectations is the sleeve pockets. While they look cool, they don't tighten up enough to be useful for practical storage. In my case, I ended up removing them, which didn't affect the hoodie's overall appearance, but it was a bit disappointing that they didn't serve their intended purpose.  In conclusion, the XYXIONGMAO Streetwear/Techwear Hoodie is a comfortable and stylish choice for those who appreciate both fashion and function. Just remember to order a size larger than usual. The sleeve pockets may not be as practical as they seem, but the comfort and overall style of the hoodie make it a solid addition to your wardrobe.
